statements: SELECT investment_id, asset_class, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_return > 0
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC
SELECT asset_class, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY asset_class ORDER BY total_investment DESC
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks'
SELECT investment_id, investment_return FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_return > 5 ORDER BY investment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks' AND investment_return < 0
SELECT AVG(investment_amount) AS average_investment FROM investments GROUP BY asset_class
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT investment_id, investment_date, investment_return FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_return
SELECT * FROM Investments;
SELECT investment_id, amount, investment_date FROM Investments;
SELECT investment_id, asset_class, investment_type, amount, investment_date FROM Investments WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, return_rate, risk_level, performance_date FROM Performance WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE investment_id = 1;
SELECT investment_id, asset_class FROM Investments WHERE amount > 50000 ORDER BY investment_date DESC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_type, amount FROM Investments WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks' AND investment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.investment_id, i.asset_class, p.return_rate FROM Performance p JOIN Investments i ON p.investment_id = i.investment_id WHERE p.risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY p.return_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(return_rate) AS avg_return, SUM(amount) AS total_investment FROM Performance p JOIN Investments i ON p.investment_id = i.investment_id;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price FROM investment_assets;
SELECT * FROM investment_performance WHERE annual_return > 0;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, asset_class FROM investment_assets WHERE purchase_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM investment_performance WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_class_name FROM investment_assets JOIN asset_classes ON investment_assets.asset_class = asset_classes.asset_class_name;
SELECT asset_name, asset_class, purchase_price, purchase_date FROM investment_assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, purchase_date FROM investment_assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date FROM investment_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT ip.total_return, ip.annual_return, ip.performance_date, ia.asset_name FROM investment_performance ip JOIN investment_assets ia ON ip.asset_id = ia.asset_id;
SELECT ac.asset_class_name, ac.description, ia.asset_name FROM asset_classes ac JOIN investment_assets ia ON ac.asset_class_name = ia.asset_class;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPerformance;
SELECT asset_class, investment_amount FROM InvestmentPerformance WHERE asset_class='Stocks';
SELECT * FROM AssetClasses ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT id, return_amount, return_date FROM InvestmentReturns WHERE return_amount > 1000 ORDER BY return_amount ASC;
SELECT investment_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM PerformanceAnalysis WHERE analysis_result >= 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPerformance ORDER BY investment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_class, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM InvestmentPerformance GROUP BY asset_class;
SELECT ip.asset_class, ir.return_amount FROM InvestmentPerformance ip JOIN InvestmentReturns ir ON ip.id = ir.investment_id WHERE ir.return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ip.asset_class, pa.analysis_type, pa.analysis_result FROM InvestmentPerformance ip JOIN PerformanceAnalysis pa ON ip.id = pa.investment_id WHERE pa.analysis_result > 0.5;
SELECT ap.asset_name, ap.asset_type, ir.return_amount FROM AssetClasses ap JOIN InvestmentReturns ir ON ap.id = ir.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM Assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_class FROM Assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_class FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_class FROM Assets WHERE asset_class = 'Equity' AND asset_name LIKE 'Stock%';
SELECT a.asset_id, a.asset_name, a.asset_class, ac.class_name FROM Assets a JOIN Asset_Class_Mapping acm ON a.asset_id = acm.asset_id JOIN Asset_Classes ac ON acm.class_id = ac.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_class FROM Assets ORDER BY asset_class DESC;
SELECT A.asset_name, AC.class_name FROM Assets A JOIN Asset_Class_Mapping ACM ON A.asset_id = ACM.asset_id JOIN Asset_Classes AC ON ACM.class_id = AC.class_id WHERE A.asset_id = 1;
SELECT I.investment_id, A.asset_name, I.investment_amount FROM Investments I JOIN Assets A ON I.asset_id = A.asset_id WHERE I.investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY I.investment_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(return_percentage) AS avg_return FROM Returns;
